aboutpara: Enthusiastic Student with superior skills in working in both team-based and independent capacities. Bringing strong work ethic and excellent organizational skills to any setting. Excited to bring above average user skills in information technology and social media

bullets: Designed and developed responsive, user-friendly UI components using Flutter for mobile applications

education.universityPara: I am currently pursuing my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering.
